Reviews.Title: No SIM card
Reviews.Author: Arrikka
Reviews.Content: I love my iPhone but it didn't come with SIM card which made things difficult with getting it turned on I had a lot of running around & phone calls to make on trying to get one so I which the seller was specific on that aspect

Reviews.Title: Malware disaster!!!
Reviews.Author: Liz Tonsmeire
Reviews.Content: The iPhone I received was FULL OF MASSIVE AMOUNTS OF MALWARE!!!!!  I'm a fully certified apple IT specialist, including iOS and Xcode, and a, very familiars with the log aggregation coding used to infect these devices. The unit had a Bluetooth activated (though the unit was not cell enabled) attached to a blue tooth dun modem uploading to a Windows server in Taiwan. It was dead when I received it. I plugged the device in, went to bed, and when I awoke, malware was rampant in my home office osx network and system. I've lost 5 days of business, infected $25k of pro equipment, and have been in a never ending cycle of malware hell. Between hardware software and lost business, this iPhone has cost me a fortune!!! You'd think a company stripping and selling a high end iPhone, would attach it to a computer, strip it properly, check the logs in the basic settings, and at least the Bluetooth was off??? Though the phone looked lovely, the infected systems would devastate anyone owning any apple products. I highly recommend ensuring its clean prior to purchase.  Awful

Reviews.Title: I can't use it
Reviews.Author: Gerard Garza
Reviews.Content: I was sold a phone that could not be activated because it is still attached to the original owners account. Its is therefor, useless. I am baffled by how a company is aloud to buy and sell a phone to consumers that cannot be used.

Reviews.Title: Zero stars if possible. STOLEN PHONE
Reviews.Author: Lidia
Reviews.Content: Bought my boyfriend an iPhone 5 here. Not only was the phone NOT new, when I took it to activate at Sprint, they turned me away because not only was the phone active on another account, it was reported STOLEN. They haven't replied to my emails, haven't refunded my money. DO NOT BUY FROM THEM.

Reviews.Title: Best iPhone yet
Reviews.Author: Brandon
Reviews.Content: I have owned a white iphone 5 and a black iphone 5. I loved them both! The charger can be plugged in both ways, the phone is way thinner than the last iphone, and it has a retina display. The picture are crazy good, the new operating system is great, and the headphones are amazing!!! 6 stars!

Reviews.Title: Seller is Extremely Dedicated to Customer Satisfaction!!!
Reviews.Author: powell8474
Reviews.Content: Well, I received my son's birthday gift, the iPhone 5 today, a mere 4 days after ordering. There was no SIM card with this phone which I didn't think would be an issue because from what I understood, Sprint doesn't require a SIM Card. I was wrong, they do.  After making a million phone calls to local Sprint Stores, Sprint Customer Service and emailing the seller, I was finally able to purchase a SIM Card for $19.99 at a local Sprint Store.  There was 3 days that this seller emailed me back to help me figure out a way to get this phone activated.  He even took the liberty of contacting Sprint Customer Service himself to help me get the problem resolved.  In the end, he sold me a great phone at a great price, the delivery time was super quick and he went above and beyond to help me find a solution to a difficult cell phone provider.  I will tell everyone I know that if they want to purchase a cell phone or cell phone accessories, this is the seller they should go to 1st.  Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Awsome phone!
Reviews.Author: Nikol
Reviews.Content: Don't know how I lived without an IPhone for so long. It's super fast, battery lasts, and it's easier to use then an android.

Reviews.Title: Ask for full description
Reviews.Author: Cari
Reviews.Content: The phone was in great conditions make sure to ask for the real descriptions of the phone and that the phone is ESN clean

Reviews.Title: missing parts
Reviews.Author: danielwong
Reviews.Content: missing parts or accessories. there is no charger and ear pods inside, only one iphone 5.I don't know why it is missing.

Reviews.Title: iPhone 5
Reviews.Author: Kvincen
Reviews.Content: I lost my iPhone 5 and I thought I'd replace it with a new one. But the new one was so expensive so I thought I'll go and get an used one but I wasn't sure about the quality. There wasn't much of a description when I bought it, neither were the actual pictures uploaded. And I had second thoughts about it too. But when my phone arrived, It didn't seem like an used one. It looked brand new. no scratches, nothing. I was so happy with the quality and shipping. I was more than satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Best phone ever!!!
Reviews.Author: Shayla Reuben
Reviews.Content: I am absolutely estatic over this phone I totally love it. The phone was sent at a reasonable time I would definitely buy from this seller again. The product was exactly what was advertised in the photo I'm very pleased thanks for the best phone ever!!!!

Reviews.Title: Bad Customer Service/Not able to unlock
Reviews.Author: PaChee Cheng
Reviews.Content: At first I bought this phone because I was under the impression that it was unlocked. After contacting the seller, it turned out that it WAS LOCKED AND THEY WERE UNABLE TO PROVIDE ME THE CODE TO UNLOCK. I was told to contact Sprint but Sprint wouldn't give it to me because they said that for security reasons/the seller should have been able to provide me the code. After much frustrations with this seller and not answering my emails, I filed a claim with Amazon and after that claim went through, he immediately started answering my emails again. Bottom line, very bad customer service & they make you pay restocking fee. I will NEVER order anything from this company again. Never worked with such an ignorant seller.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Isabel
Reviews.Content: Returned the phone.  Never was able to connect the phone with Sprint. The phone was still under someone's account who owed money.

Reviews.Title: was not new
Reviews.Author: whitten w volentine
Reviews.Content: Ok phone, a few small bugs. And it was not a NEW phone. Not new as advertised. bummed out after I opening the box.

Reviews.Title: iPhone 5
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: Ok upon receiving the phone I was a little worried because the charger was touchy. I figured out a good technique and which side it prefers. It cant be juiced while in otter box otherwise the touch screen gets a mind of its own. Then my next problem was trying to activate that's when I found out there was no SIM card inside I had to make an appt with apple and waste my time and energy.  I took off a point for each Faux pas the cosmetics were on point good serial number battery lasts aside from the awkward charging unit I'm very happy over all with my purchase of the iPhone 5.  I paid less than buying a new phone plus sprint won't even sell you these without a new contract or update on your plan.

Reviews.Title: do not buy from this seller!
Reviews.Author: Lisa Schleinkofer
Reviews.Content: I bought a used iphone 5 from Mobilekarma and the battery does not work.  I have to charge my phone 3 times a day so that it does not die, and no I do not have all my apps open. .  They sent me a replacement phone that had the exact same problem.  I was told by them it was the iphone 5 not their phones.  But 2 other people in my family have the iphone 5 and do not have this problem.  I think they put cheap junk batteries in their phones.  I bought from them because they had  a good rating, but ended up with a junk phone!

Reviews.Title: 4 star
Reviews.Author: dazmin
Reviews.Content: The only and i mean the ONLY reason this didnt get five stars is because it didnt come with a sim card. i had to search FAR AND WIDE for a damn sim card. your carrier,if they have any,gives them to u free, other than that phone works PERFECT .

Reviews.Title: doesn't hv the accessories,can't be charged,can't be used, it's useless
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: hi,for my daughter birthday i bought this iphone5- it's useless, we can't use it.I know that every cell phone can be turned on cos the battery is charged for a little time,but this one can't be turn on,is completely discharged,doesn't hv a battery charger,doesn't hv the accessory that allows you to pull out the little thing(i don't know how is called)where you can insert the sim card ( what can I use, a piece of wire????????)- I don't even know if it have the battery inside, cos the Apple phones can be opened only by the Apple service center,this iphone doesn't turn on.As an accessory hv only the earheadphone. Doesn't even hv a manual of instructions, hv only 2 Apple adhesives. My daughter is disappointed and so am I.Help.Thank you

Reviews.Title: this phone sucks.
Reviews.Author: Taylor B.
Reviews.Content: I was sold this iPhone and could not get it activated to my account to use it, so i am now stuck with it. i hope noone gets this phone  because you will be screwed and not be able to use it.

Reviews.Title: Nelson
Reviews.Author: nelson
Reviews.Content: I'm very angry becuz the iPhone doesn't work .. I went to the store for activation then told me that the iPhone has something bad that not get the activation .. So I pay 260 dlls for iPhone not working and I pay too 160 for activation and month the iPhone not working .. Tomorrow I'm gonna go the send to back the iPhone .. So i need my money back please becuz your iPhone not good .. Thank you !! My name is Nelson

Reviews.Title: I love Apple products and the iPhone 5 is breaking records.
Reviews.Author: Light Song Reviews "Micah Flood"
Reviews.Content: I love this phone, way better for me then the Android,  I love simple and sleek design's and this phone does all of that...

Reviews.Title: Good phone in good condition
Reviews.Author: Lyonel L Maxime Jr
Reviews.Content: I really like the iPhone. I had a galaxy before this. The galaxy had a bigger screen, which can be good or bad, but the iPhone has it's pluses. The iPhone is user interface is more intuitive, once you get used to having only 1 button to navigate. I really like the facetime. It is much smoother and easier to use than the android video apps I've used. The only problem I had was that it didn't come with a SIM card for Sprint. I think they cost like $40. Other than that, it came to me in perfect condition.

Reviews.Title: excellent service with this company
Reviews.Author: wylie cater
Reviews.Content: I had to return this phone because I couldn't get it hooked up where I live.  Reported to them and they sent UPS to pick it up with a label. They made it so easy. Definitely would reccomend them. The phone came the next day in excellent condition. If you need a sprint phone, they're great. I just have to use AT&T; out here.

Reviews.Title: My wife loved her birthday present.
Reviews.Author: Charles B Stewart Jr
Reviews.Content: The phone is great.  It did not come with a cord to charge it nor  memory card.  I was not clear that these were not to be included.

Reviews.Title: Hi
Reviews.Author: ginga simona
Reviews.Content: I can`t send messages from this phone and I can`t use it in my country.. I pay this phone so please help me to fix this problem..please!!!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Dominik Montanez
Reviews.Content: Phone was great and new like it siad on the description. Love my new iPhone been using it for a good month and now problem thanks !

Reviews.Title: Great Deal!
Reviews.Author: Catherine C.
Reviews.Content: Great Deal!!! Thank you vasinov! The phone is exactly same as your description.Very good! I'm so impressed by your honesty.

Reviews.Title: Love this phone
Reviews.Author: Erin Scott
Reviews.Content: I upgraded from the iPhone 4 and this is even better than that.  It's lighter and actually seems sturdier.  Great camera, great storage, great speed.  I love this phone.

Reviews.Title: -_- what now??
Reviews.Author: Mara
Reviews.Content: So the phone is beautiful!It looks great!!!!It turns on smoothly and feels do light!I decided to treat myself with something expensive. So I did I received it on the date I was told to. But I asked for a sprint iphone 5 [SPRINT]  but I got a phone that works with SIM cards witch sprint doesn't do -_-What the heck do I do now -_-

Reviews.Title: i looove the iphone!!
Reviews.Author: no1punjabi1
Reviews.Content: it is a very nice phone and its long but fits perfectly in my hand.  the phone is verry pretty

Reviews.Title: Applie iPhone 5 Review
Reviews.Author: K. Mac
Reviews.Content: The phone arrived on time and it was supposed to be brand new (unopen). It was packaged as brand new, however, anyone who has an iPhone knows that you when you first turn on the phone it takes you through steps to setup the phone. I did not have to go through those steps, which means the phone had already went through the setup.The charging cable that came with the phone in not a genuine Apple cable. I compared it against a charging cable that I have from a previous Apple 5 and though similar it it not a genuine Apple charging cable.Overall satisfied with the phone. Please note the phone does not come with a SIM card and you will need to purchase one.

Reviews.Title: I do not suggest Sprint for iPhone use!
Reviews.Author: Robert Browne
Reviews.Content: I do NOT recommend using Sprint for cell service with iPhones.I've been a customer of Sprint's for 13 years and received a threatening letter from them, today, telling me that, (all of sudden) I am using too many roaming minutes on our two phones. I checked the phones and saw that, as I thought, data roaming was not turned on. I called Sprint and was told that although data roaming on iPhones may be turned off, it still uses data roaming and that you have to turn ALL roaming off. Seriously?! We live in the woods and I need my phone. The problem isn't with too much voice roaming, just data, but I can't use voice, either?! Nonsense! This is a problem between Sprint and Apple, not me. Sprint sold me the phones, Sprint sold the plan at this address, and now Sprint is mad because we're using the phones.Screw them, they can go ahead and drop me, I'll go to one of their competitors who are doing a better job than they are, in terms of coverage, anyway.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY FROM THIS COMPANY
Reviews.Author: Andy Amoroso
Reviews.Content: The iPhone 5 that I purchased came packaged like new but when I took it to the Sprint store for activation they informed me that the phone was listed as lost or stolen & could not be activated. I was lucky enough to hang onto the phone so that I could return. I was worried that they would confiscate it.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Cameryn
Reviews.Content: Got it and it worked perfectly. It was exactly what i wanted, i experienced no problems with it! ! !

Reviews.Title: Horrible
Reviews.Author: Ricky candi
Reviews.Content: This sprint is the worst and they dont work in brazil and forbid to unlockI order by mistake beacouse i wantes 2 unloack phones

Reviews.Title: Couldn't be any more satisfied!
Reviews.Author: Britney W.
Reviews.Content: Well,I'm usually quite shaky about purchasing things online, especially when playing with $500, but I took a chance after reading the seller feedback which truly aided in my decision and I thought it would only be fair if I gave you a hand here...My purchase took about 2 weeks to come, when I checked it was delivered to the wrong state. I notified the seller and he/she was very prompt in finding out what went wrong and went to the greatest extent to make sure I was a satisfied customer. He/she was also very prompt in responding to messages!! Impressively! Once my phone arrived brand new in box as stated, it worked fine. I tried to upgrade my iOS through itunes update and that's where the problem came in it was not the sellers fault but I contacted Sprint and initially told me I had to order a new phone ... I contacted the seller and he/she provided excellent customer service even with problems with the phone. FesCo was ready to troubleshoot with me step by step! Sprint did end up replacing my phone!Extremly Satisfied (apart from the long waiting) but that led to the reason why I am extremely satisfied with this seller and I would buy from FesCo again!I am real, Facebook: Viva La Pinky

Reviews.Title: Lost or stolen phone
Reviews.Author: Lyla_yueting
Reviews.Content: Didn't think I could be so "lucky" to get a lost or stolen phone. Must be prepared for anything before paying or, for the better, just buy a new one.

Reviews.Title: ESN Non exsisting
Reviews.Author: Katherine Garcia
Reviews.Content: false advertising on product, does not have any use if product is non existing. Hope that no one makes the same mistake in buying a phone like this.

Reviews.Title: I am torn about this phone
Reviews.Author: Sharak Gangei "Sharak"
Reviews.Content: It is a BEAUTIFUL phone. Unarguably the best crafted phone there is. Who wants to pay hundred of dollars for a plastic phone. The screen has a matte finish and its just gorgeous. Technically, it is on par with the latest and greatest on the market so do not  worry about technical specs this phone has it all.  The only technical complaints I have about this phone is that the width is too small. It could use .25 or .5 inch more on width for comfort of viewing. I don't need my thumb to be able to reach 97% of the screen. What for? I use my smart phone with 2 hands most of the time. One hand when i just wake up and am too lazy to move. Looking at the screen hurts my eyes because its so small, although gorgeous. I just wish watching netflix videos on it didn't make me squint and that when i flip my phone on it's side that there is actually room on the screen for the keyboard and to see what you are typing. Another complaint is the battery. I wake up at 8am and take the phone off the charger. By 2pm, I have made 20min in phone calls, checked email every half hour, and used apps for about 30minutes and am down to 20% battery. If I leave the phone on standby it seems like it could go 2 days without a charge, but when you are taking it off standby every 20min to check a message or an app, you won't go half a day on it... which doesn't make sense to me. The battery should be enough to get you through the day. Not to mention the battery has limited charges until it degrades, so when the battery is only holding an 80% charge you will really feel it then and be so sorry because Apple charges $80 for a new battery which is NOT covered by the phone's $200 extended warranty.  It is a great phone, probably the best on the market, but let's be real. The 2 facts stated above make the phone less than perfect, but iOS is it's tragic downfall. It is not just a matter of getting used to iOS, it is a matter of accepting Apple's ludicrous policies. Get ready to NOT experience technology as iOS blocks you from accessing more than half of it. Sitting with your best friend trying out ringtones? Want to share one with her because you both found it hilarious and want to set it for each others contacts? Well, just go kill yourself cause that will never happen. YOU CANNOT SEND AUDIO FILES THROUGH TEXT, or any other way from the iPhone whatsoever. I wanted to share a couple ringtones with my Mom and cousin who also has an iPhone. Nope. Not going to happen. Your friend and your mom and your cousin will just have to buy the $2 app and download the ringtone for themselves and then upload it to iTunes on your pc via USB, put it on a ringtone folder, sync it back to your phone because enabling the ringtone is a whole big complicated process. YOU CANNOT SIMPLY SELECT THE FILE AND SET AS RING TONE. Meanwhile you just duplicated your music library so both your computer and iPhone has maxed out their storage and now you need to spend hours on end cleaning it up because it was not intelligent enough to sync your material without duplicating it 5 times. You need a credit card for iTunes, or a prepaid card with unlimited funds because every time you download an application, whether it be free or already purchased, the App will send a $1 authorization charge to your credit card and if you don't have money on it then you are disabled from downloading any free apps or from accessing previously purchased apps. Basically you are locked out of the App market, which makes up for most of the smartphone experience so the fact that you potentially will not be able to access it is ludicrous. Wow, I really paid more for less? I am so angry at myself for buying into the hype and want to return it and get my Android back. Using the iPhone makes me feel like I am playing right into a Fortune 500 companies pocket rather than getting the experience I deserve to get after spending so much on a device. It is rather insulting, my intelligence and bank accounts are insulted by Apple. I will return it and go with Android which does not infuriate me like iOS does... it only annoys me at times by various minor instabilities, but at least THAT I can live with. One more important issue.  I have not been getting any 3g service on my phone at all. Sprint says their service is working perfectly. Apple confirms it is a perfectly good phone. After hours of technical support and exchanging the phone I seem to be the ONLY PERSON WITH THIS PROBLEM. Neither Apple, nor Sprint, claim to have had any other complaints about this. I seem to be the only one. I guess god just hates me huh? Or one of the companies are lieing. One last thought... with Apple's extended care, you pay $100 into it, and then $50 per replacement you get up to 2 replacements. So $200 for 2 phones. If you can sell them for more than $100, and you can even with a bad esn, then you have made a profit. Even used and old iPhones retain alot of value. Potentially making your 1st phone free.

ProductInfo.Features:
With the iPhone 5, Apple equips this smartphone with a larger 4-inch retina display, adds 4G LTE high-speed data, and includes a faster A6 processor
Features global roaming, Siri voice assistant, AirPlay media streaming, an 8-megapixel camera with HD recording, and a HD front facing camera
This model comes with 16 GB of internal storage and supports WiFi connectivity
The iPhone 5 offers a slim and stylish design that is both lightweight and easy to carry
Offer includes US Cable and Wall Charger
ProductInfo.Name: Apple iPhone 5 16GB 4G LTE White - Sprint
